kpi.name: M1022C230

kpi_info.title: PS USER PLANE RELEASE TO DCH 0/0 DUE TO CHANNEL TYPE SWITCH FAILURE
kpi_info.use: The number of PS NRT user plane reconfigurations to DCH 0/0 because of failed channel type switch. UPDATED: When channel type switch from HSxPA to Rel99 DCH x/y is triggered and for some reason the procedure fails and therefore DCH 0/0 is allocated instead. In multi RAB cases this counter is updated seprately for every RAB.

kpi.kpi_alias: PS USER PLANE RELEASE TO DCH 0/0 DUE TO CHANNEL TYPE SWITCH FAILURE
